pages.title: Overview
pages.text: Magnet will allow an upgrade to collect items in its effective work area, these items go in the pedestal.

pages.title: Obtaining
pages.text: This can be Obtained from Villagers. Normal Enchanting, and Enchanting Focused Book (Magnet).

pages.title: Focus Book (Magnet)
pages.text: Effective Enchanting levels are 0-50 by Default, Some mods may modify this enchant level ceiling.

pages.title: Levels
pages.text: Magnet Effects all upgrades with an AOE work area the same. $(li)Min Level 1. $(li)Max Level 1.
